h2_title: The Webbed Hollow Luojia Fragrant Vines
content: Once at the Purple Cloud Mountain, run up the hill and over the rope bridge to activate the first Keeper's Shrine in the area. Turn right instead of heading over the bridge and defeat the Verdant Glow Spirit that's guarding the vine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Luojia_Fragrant_Vine_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow Luojia Fragrant Vines' and the sub-subsection 'Purple Mountain Luojia Fragrant Vine'.
The content is as follows:
Once at the Purple Cloud Mountain, run up the hill and over the rope bridge to activate the first Keeper's Shrine in the area. Turn right instead of heading over the bridge and defeat the Verdant Glow Spirit that's guarding the vine.
